title: New: Totoake – Beachfire
body:
**Totoake **creates hazy, loveable bedroom pop via Santa Cruz, California.

His latest track _Beachfire_ certainly channels the vibe of his surroundings with chirpy melodies and surfy production throughout.

Check out _Beachfire_ below and drift off into summer longing… (Especially if you live in dreary, wet Glasgow like me)

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/137147966″ params=”auto\_play=false&hide\_related=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /\]
